Job title: Joint General Manager (Civil) / Deputy General Manager (Civil)
Qualifications required: JGM: Working on analogous posts or Group 'A' officer working on regular posts in Pay Level 13/ Level 12 of IRSE cadre of Indian Railways or Civil Engineering officers having corresponding grade and 9 years Group 'A' service or its equivalent on regular basis in Civil Engineering Cadre of Central Government/State Govt. Indian Railways or its equivalent in PSUs/ Statutory Authorities. DGM: Working on analogous posts or a Group 'A' or Group 'B' Gazetted officer working on regular basis in Pay Level 12/ Level 11 from Civil Engineering Cadre of Indian Railways/Central Govt./ State Govt./ PSUs/Statutory Authority having Degree in Civil Engineering with 6 years of service in Group 'A'/Group 'B' or its equivalent or Diploma in Civil Engineering with 15 years' experience.
Skills required: 1. Previous experience of Planning & execution of Land/Estate. 2. Experience of working in organization/area connected with Land Management. 3. Experience in Tendering work. 4. Knowledge of Computer.
Salary or compensation details: JGM: Pay Level-13 (7th CPC), DGM: Pay Level-12 (7th CPC)
Mode of application: Online or Offline (via email: rldavnn0725@gmail.com or post to Dy. General Manager (HR), Rail Land Development Authority, Unit No.-702-B, 7th Floor, Konnectus Tower-II, DMRC Building, Ajmeri Gate, Delhi-110002)

Qualifications required: Manager: Working on analogous post or Group 'A'/Group 'B' Gazetted officer working on regular posts in Level 10/Level 09/Level 08 (7th CPC) from Electrical Engineering (Technical) Cadre of Indian Railways/Central Governments/State Govt./PSUs of Central Govt. & State Govt./ PSEs/Statutory Authorities/Boards, having Degree in Electrical Engineering with 05 years of service in Group A/Group B, or its equivalent 'OR' Diploma in Electrical Engineering with 10 years' experience. Assistant Manager: Working in Electrical Engineering (Technical) Cadre of Indian Railways/ Central Govt./ State Govt. on regular post in Pay Level -7(7th CPC) or its equivalent in PSUs/PSEs/Statutory Authorities/Boards having Degree in Electrical Engineering with 03 years of service. OR Working in Electrical Engineering (Technical) Cadre of Indian Railways/ Central Govt./ State Govt. on regular post in Pay Level-7 (7th CPC) or its equivalent in PSUs/PSEs/Statutory Authorities/Boards having Diploma in Electrical Engineering with 05 years of service.
Skills required: 1. MEPF work building construction related work of electrical. 2. Experience in Tendering work. 3. Knowledge of Computer.
Salary or compensation details: Manager: Pay Level-11 (7th CPC), Assistant Manager: Pay Level-9 (7th CPC)
Mode of application: Online or Offline (via email: rldavnn0725@gmail.com or post to Dy. General Manager (HR), Rail Land Development Authority, Unit No.-702-B, 7th Floor, Konnectus Tower-II, DMRC Building, Ajmeri Gate, Delhi-110002)
